name: Golf Frenzy - Exam Game
description:
Enjoy some relaxing golf, each level has a different obstacle!

Controls:

- Click to build shot power (Seen by the power meter on the bottom of each level)

- R to go back to the main menu

- Numpad to cycle through levels (1-5)

Sources:

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

(Ball Sound)

Music obtained from https://opengameart.org/

Author Pudgyplatypus

(Music) - Title is "FutureAmbient_3"

Features:
  • Ball aiming and shooting
  • Ball aiming line (Line length is not based off shot strength)
  • Ball sunk
  • Ball reset
  • Ball stopping
  • Particles
  • Trail
  • Ball sound effects
  • Music
  • Title screen + Level select
  • In-Game UI
  • Start of level text
  • End of level text
  • Level 1 - Basic Level
  • Level 2 - BlackHole
  • Level 3 - Maze + Cinemachine
  • Level 4 - Door triggered by hits
  • Level 5 - Checkpoints
